fullplot: A heffalump is heard trumpeting in the hundred acre woods. Winnie the Pooh, Tigger, and Piglet are scared and rush to Rabbit's house for advice. Roo joins them and they all agree that heffalumps are nearby after finding a huge footprint. They decide to set out on an expedition to catch the heffalump. Roo is not allowed to come along because he is too little.

title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie

tomatoes.consensus: A charming and delightful walk through the Hundred Acres Woods for young viewers.
